price: Eles dirão: "Glorificado sejas! Tu és nosso Protetor, em vez deles. Ao contrário, eles adoravam os gênios. A maioria deles era crente neles."
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minūna
